attributes.action: Deprivation of citizenship by virtue of birth
attributes.additional_details: The citizen that goes abroad to fight and trained and the suicide that killed innocent citizen and destroyed properties their citizenship and passport withdrawn. A truly UK citizen will not killed his compatriots and will not set his own house ablaze. Any UK citizen that flew to fight in another country, impliedly saying am not a UK citizen, its my parents who were UK citizen not him/her. Any UK born child should be ask when they attain the age of 18 years if he/she wants to continue with UK citizenship. The country that he/she fighting for should be his/her country automatic on their return into the UK, this does not render them stateless, because they were coming from one country they LOVE most and decided to fight for that is their country. We need to be strict in order to overcome the issue of terrorist in the UK. Terrorist should not abuse Human Rights Act 1998.
